# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (Mono Auto Generated)
mono_crash.*

# Mono auto generated files
*.pidb

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# C# specific ignore pattern
*.dll
*.exe
*.pdb
*.cache
*.ilk
*.log
*.mdf
*.ldf
*.ndk
*.ndp
*.ndb
*.hdf

# Visual Studio Code specific ignore pattern
.vscode/
.vscode/*

# Rider specific ignore pattern
.idea/
.idea/*

# Packages
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
packages/
# Uncomment if necessary however generally it will be regenerated when needed
# packages/*

# Microsoft Azure Build Output
csx/
*.build.csdef

# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# VS Code directories
.vscode/
.vscode/*

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows shortcuts
*.lnk

# App config file
App.config

# Others
*.cache
*.zip
*.rar
*.tar.gz
